title: Master 1 Main LF Smurf Duo
body:
Master 1 Main looking to duo smurf with someone in plat to diamond for S4 rewards, hope to get it done fast, or can duo more into diamond if liked, diamond 1/master/challenger preferred add me
"lLee Sin"

replies.body: ign, selfz.. this season ive had 3 accounts d1, no more than 50 points tho, 2 of them ive sold and this is my main one that mess around with, i will start another smurf unranked, lmk if you want to duo, i main jungle, mostly play lee.
